titles.title: Requesting that the President issue a proclamation annually calling upon the people of the United States to observe Global Family Day, One Day of Peace and Sharing, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Requests that the President: (1) issue a proclamation annually calling upon the people of the United States to observe Global Family Day, One Day of Peace and Sharing; and (2) invite former Presidents of the United States, Nobel laureates, and other notables to join the President in promoting appropriate activities for the people of the United States and in extending appropriate greetings from U.S. families to families around the world.
